languages.text: "Найдите источник слухов и накажите виновных. Я не хочу сечь головы всем подряд".
"Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."
languages.original_text: "Найдите источник слухов и накажите виновных. Я не хочу сечь головы всем подряд".

traits.locale_text: "Find the source of the rumors and punish those responsible. I don't want unnecessary deaths."
"Find the source of the rumors and punish those responsible. I don't want unnecessary deaths."

languages.text: “找到谣言的来源，惩罚那些散播谣言的人。我不希望造成不必要的伤亡。”
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

traits.locale_text: “找到谣言的来源，惩罚那些散播谣言的人。我不希望造成不必要的伤亡。”

languages.text: «Encuentre la fuente de los rumores y castigue a los responsables. No quiero muertes innecesarias».
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

traits.locale_text: «Encuentre la fuente de los rumores y castigue a los responsables. No quiero muertes innecesarias».

languages.text: "Findet die Quelle der Gerüchte und bestraft die Verantwortlichen. Ich will keine unnötigen Todesfälle."
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

traits.locale_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

languages.text: « Trouvez l'origine des rumeurs et punissez les responsables. Je ne veux pas de morts inutiles. »
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

traits.locale_text: « Trouvez l'origine des rumeurs et punissez les responsables. Je ne veux pas de morts inutiles. »

languages.text: 「噂の出所を突き止めて、原因となった者を罰してくれ。不要な死は望まない」
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."

traits.locale_text: 「噂の出所を突き止めて、原因となった者を罰してくれ。不要な死は望まない」

languages.text: "Söylentilerin kaynağını bulun ve sorumluları cezalandırın. Kimsenin gereksiz yere ölmesini istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Find the source of the rumours and punish those responsible. I don't want any unnecessary deaths."
